text: Who can build a module for email which will pull line items out of a deal and add them to an order confirmation email triggered by a workflow?
I already built that once, I just can share the code. Give me a minute.
Maybe you have to tweak it a little :)

Thanks Thomas! Couple thoughts:

1. As the agency owner here, and only mildly dangerous coder, there's only a small chance I could do this on my own with your code snippet. Will probably need some help.
2. You could be that help and just make it work in my client's portal. We can discuss.
3. If I'm able to miraculously manage this on my own, or even with one of my own devs assistance....and it works....I'm buying you a steak dinner. Finis.
